extendedInfo.description: The ONLY one Android app can Access and stream your Android SD card's photo, music and video over WiFi to your DLNA certified devices - include Big Screen Andorid TV, XBox 360, DLNA TVs, DLNA Blu-ray players, WDTV Live, PS3, XMBC, it can even stream to Windows 7 Media Player.I have test it on some devices, and it may not works well at some devices. Please don't give me  1 Star if your device does not works well.Key Feautures Air Play Include:â Directly stream your SD card music, photo or video to your DLNA certified devices - this includes Windows 7 Media Player, XBox 360, DLNA TVs, DLNA Blu-ray players, WDTV Live, PS3, XMBC,etc.â Directly stream any other DLNA Media Server content to your DLNA certified devices.â Browse any certified DLNA media Server content, like photo, music and video files.â Remote control your DLNA media renders, this includes many DLNA TVs, XBox 360 in Media Center Extender Mode, etc.â Share SD card content or Other meida server's content to    Any other user though twitter, facebook or other software.â As media server, the SD card root directory "share" as theShare directory, every DLNA device could browse its content.**********How To Use *************1), Allow your DLNA certified devices can be remote controlled.For Windows 7 Media Player, you must click "media stream" menu, and click "allow remote control my player" and "auto allow device play my media".Other devices, you must find the help docs, and do it step by step.2), Turn on your Android device's WiFi, keep the device and DLNA certified device in the Same network.3), Start Air Play, your will see your SD card and other DLNA media server are listed at the left list view.4), Browse them, and click one file, select one DLNA Media Render, you can control it very easily.5), Share any file you browsed to your friends.6), Listen your music and watch your video, enjoy it!Notes:The Full version support Stream any certified DLNA media Server's media files to your Android phone/tablet to play.Any questions or feedback please send to xiaoyoutao2012@necta.us, or visit: http://www.necta.us.KEYWORDS:DLNA,Media,Server,UPNP,MediaHouse,BubbleUPnP

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do what it says
reviews.comment: It \"file shares\" phones content and doesn\'t connect to anything at all, my option side is half covered by the apps file veiwer and to top it all off, everytime you open, close or boot your phone, you get a push noti and a page of apps to get, this is garbage, polish this up and do what you say.
reviews.author: Cody Vogts

reviews.title: Great app for the nexus 7/360 combo
reviews.comment: Works a hell of a lot better than double twist with air sync. So easy to use over Xbox 360. The guts of the app are fine for my use, but sounds like they need some work, and the appearance could use a little work also. Improve on this and could be worth selling at the low price of a buck.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.comment: works great with acer iconia a210 tegra 3 and sounds like it works on nexus 7 must be tegra 3 devices, only advice is the look of the app far too dark but this app works great!
reviews.author: James Williamson

reviews.title: HTC one XL
reviews.comment: Brilliant idea but does not work on my phone.
reviews.author: Anwar Hussain

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: on my S2 + Raspberry PI & Openelec.. But cant read files in External SDcard.. Let me know if pro version can read.. I wanna buy it.. Thanks..
reviews.author: Nuruddin Nik Mat

reviews.title: Needs much more work!
reviews.comment: This is really an appalling app without a usable interface and should never have been released in its present form. It does not work on the Samsung S3.  The concept is good however the implementation is useless.
reviews.author: John Charlton

reviews.title: Almost gave up before I found this
reviews.comment: Too many crazy ads! Trying before I buy. Some skipping when playing from sd card but all other apps failed miserably and this actually works right away. Found imediashare that works.
reviews.author: Harrison Ashley Francis

reviews.title: It\'s ok but needs work
reviews.comment: Works well browsing media from my T-Mobile galaxy s3 to my galaxy tab 10.1 WiFi. The interface is simple, which is good, but needs a great deal of design modifications. Having the ability to pick which media app I want my specific media file to open in is a plus but having to browse by individual file rather than through a list isn\'t so practical. Also, the lack of thumbnails makes knowing which photo I\'m opening difficult. Overall this app works well for the most but needs an overhaul, design and feature wise. Keep up the good work and you\'ll have a solid product
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Mount point is limited and should be browsable or allow direct entry. Device detected, share shows, then nothing. Not one stock item on my Samsung internal \"sdcard\" not the questionably named \"extsdcard\" The built in gallery, amongst others, shares. This makes an appearance.  Did not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
Awful
reviews.comment: Terrible adware, and doesn\'t even work properly - Display is a complete mess on galaxy nexus, and over the top advertising. Would give minus one star if I could. for the full page ad on startup that you have to fight to get of the screen, and the notification bar spam. I wouldn\'t put up with such over the top spam from a working app... letalone something as broken as this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gs4
reviews.comment: Good app works great. Interface is horrible horrible though. Besides that great going
reviews.author: Christian Miranda

reviews.title: Ugh!
reviews.comment: One word...horrible! Useless app that doesn\'t even recognize devices.
reviews.author: Nicole Davis

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Worst app ever.....I hope this is a joke......
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spam and didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t find my music on the SD card and wouldn\'t play to my device. Notification bar ads started immediately!
reviews.author: Nicholas Sears

reviews.title: Great work
reviews.comment: For this app I have only one word that is awesome. Great work. All thing from my ps3 to TV only one app who control app that is air play.
reviews.author: navpreet bal

reviews.title: Good app, but not all of the features work.
reviews.comment: I can\'t get it to fast forward or rewind... But it streams beautifully.  It isn\'t intuitive.  There is a lot of guesswork involved in getting it to stream.
reviews.author: Jade Pearson

reviews.title: Not so good
reviews.comment: I can\'t stream music to my pioneer hi fi
reviews.author: A Google User
